"About Signboard Settings":
"Signboard Settings

By setting up your Signboard, other players will be able to request crafts from you using the 'Craft Search' function of the Visiphone.

On top of craft recipes, you can also make a personal comment and use a Symbol Art to catch the eye of would-be clients.

See the Online Manual below for more information:
<&URL pso2_players_manual_preparations_equipment_craft>"
